name: geonews
author: Joshfire
description: This template takes one or more feeds of geolocalized news items as inputs and runs a "slideshow" of the items on Earth. Depending on the capabilities of the device, the slideshow runs on a 3D globe or a 2D map.

geo.title: Geo content
geo.description: Feed(s) of items at the base of the slideshow. Note the template ignores items that do not define a location.

durAnimation.title: Display time
durAnimation.description: Time to wait before jumping to next item (in seconds)

durRefresh.title: Refresh interval
durRefresh.description: Interval between two news refresh (in seconds).
